lines.text: This... being together... in the garden. All of us happy, and you with us here, I didn't want it to change... and it's changed. I didn't want it to end... and it's gone. It was like something in a dream. Now you've made it real. I didn't want to be real.
Who's important to you, Captain John?
Everybody.
Another red head. Harriet one. Valerie two. Now, there's three. That means trouble.
I saw a spider this morning. That's lucky!
That's funny. Usually I hate men. I often think, do you know what, that I ought to be a nun.
Ha-ha-ha. All little kittens think that.
Little kitten. I went to a party last Christmas and they thought I was 18.
What happens when they think you're 18?
It was very silly. But, I liked it.
Oh, I do hope I'm loved as much as Cleopatra.
I shouldn't liked to be loved out loud like Cleopatra.
I should! The louder the better. I want everyone to know about me and I want to be loved by hundreds of men.
One person's love is enough for one person.
Wouldn't you rather marry an American?
I don't understand them.
Can I help you?
Can anyone?
Ten minutes ago, she wasn't born. And, tomorrow, we'll be used to her. And yesterday, we...
Bother yesterday.
This is today.
And today. Here is the baby. The baby and us. The big river. The whole world and everything.
The day ends. The end begins.
All wrapped up in Hoppity, her rabbit, was little Victoria.
Victoria, what are you doing to Hoppity?
Hoppity is my baby. He's just being born.
But, you had it born last week?
Babies can be born again and again, can't they.
